runs.comm: good length, pitching outside off stump and seaming away, Hafeez stays in his crease and lets the ball pass through to the keeper
hits a great length close to off stump and seams the ball away after angling it into the right-hander, Hafeez strides forward and shoulders arms
fuller length and straighter line, Hafeez wants to play on the leg side and he gets an inside edge through square leg
seams away from Hafeez once again from a middle and off line, Hafeez moves forward and pushes towards mid-on, not timed well
a sharp save, the bowler sticks his left hand out in his follow through and stops Hafeez's firm drive, that would have gone to mid off anyway though
strays down leg side with the line, Hafeez misses the glance, first extra of the innings

shot, he's timed this well, Hafeez moves forward to a full and straight ball and punches between the bowler and the stumps, the ball was hit hard into the pitch and it bounced out of the reach of Naveed who reached out with his right hand and tried to stop it
a full ball around off stump, Sharjeel stays on his crease and drives on the off side
a length ball outside off, Sharjeel strides forward and frees his arms, using the room on offer to drive the ball hard through cover, perfect timing, he hit that on the up

he's given him lbw! The umpire took ages and it looked like he was going to give it not out and Sharjeel was taken by surprise last minute. Amjad pitched the ball around middle and brought it back into the left-hander, Sharjeel was caught on the crease as he brought his bat down with a closed face, looking to play on the leg side. The ball hit him on the top of the knee roll. That's a tight call, might have been high or just about hitting leg stump. Will need to see replays. Yes, replays indicate it is too high, Sharjeel is unlucky and he took that decision rather well
plays it gently on the leg side

caught behind! Manzoor bags a duck! He's having a horrible Asia Cup and UAE are alive and kicking! Manzoor tried to cut that ball hard off the back foot but it was the wrong shot. There wasn't enough room and the bounce was steep from a good length as the ball seamed away from the right-hander, he got an edge through to the wicketkeeper to spark off massive celebrations
full and straight, Akmal drives firmly towards the bowler
stays in his crease to get behind the line of a good length ball and defends
good length just outside off, Hafeez once again defends watchfully on the off side
a fuller ball straying on to a middle and leg stump line, Hafeez clips it off his pads through midwicket, didn't hit it too hard but the timing was great for such a compact stroke
strides forward and pushes a good length ball towards point
good bounce from a good length just outside off stump, slight angle into the right-hander too, Hafeez adjusts to the bounce on the back foot and steer the ball with an open face towards third man
Akmal stays in his crease and keeps out a length ball that stays a bit low on an off stump line
a decent amount of outswing for Javed but the line is too wide outside off stump for the batsman to play at it

Pakistan have lost a third wicket! Hafeez has been caught at cover! He strode forward to a full ball that was swinging away from him and drove it flat and straight to the catcher at cover. That was hit quite hard.d Oh my, are we on course for an upset? Hafeez has a bit of a shocked look as he walks off. Again, Pakistan are playing with zero intensity.
solid defence, Malik strides forward and blocks confidently, that was good length outside off stump
defended on the back foot on the off side
good length on a tight line outside off, good bounce for the tall Javed, Malik stays back and defends
Malik drives and is beaten! Gets on the front foot but chases the ball outside off without moving towards the line at all, beaten by the outswing

beaten by the seam inwards now! Malik once again moved forward and drove away from his body at a fullish ball outside off, it nipped in off the pitch to beat the inside edge, he could have so easily played on there
good length outside off, not giving the batsmen anything, Akmal moves forward and shoulders arms
driven off the front foot towards mid-on, Malik takes a few steps out but is turned back by Akmal
Akmal goes back and tries to force the ball through the offside but mis-times it into the ground near hit feet
flicked off the pads in front of square leg
good length on middle and off, Malik leans forward in his crease and pushes on the leg side
good length on a tight line around off stump - UAE doing the basics beautifully so far - Malik moves forward and blocks
a full ball around off stump, Akmal moves back in his crease and drives the ball to mid off
slides down leg side, Akmal moves across his stumps to glance but can't connect
whipped off the hips behind square for a single
once again the line is too straight, allowing the batsman to get off the mark with a tuck off the pads through square leg
shot! That was so full outside off stump, perfect for the drive, and Malik executed perfectly, moving forward to present a full face and hit the ball wide of mid-off
good length again outside off, Malik moves forward and shoulders arms
good length on off and middle, Malik gets forward and defends with a straight bat
goes back to hit the ball through midwicket for a single
leans forward and taps the ball towards long on for one more
moves back and punches the innocuous delivery to long-on for one more, no sign of danger from the spinner so far
strides forward to drive a tossed up ball outside off to long off for another single
goes back and across but can't find the gap at midwicket
driven to long off for another single, five ones in that over
good length on a tight off stump line with a round-arm action, Akmal stays back and defends
Akmal aims to whip the ball off his pads but misses, that was going down leg side
shot, and great stop! Akmal punched the ball hard off the back foot towards point where the fielder dived to his left to make the save
leans across in his crease and plays the ball on the leg side
full ball on middle stump, Akmal comes forward and drives the ball between mid-on and midwicket for two runs

cut late off the back foot towards third man, Akmal hurries Malik back for the second, the throw from Naveed was of the good old under-arm variety from the deep - like Javagal Srinath used to - don't see that much any more.
defended back to the bowler
a flat ball outside off stump, Malik is strong on the cut and he goes back and hits the ball well enough to beat the diving fielder on the backward point boundary
played off the front foot to the bowler
a big appeal for lbw from the bowler as Malik pushes forward to defend, the ball skidded on with the arm instead of turning away but the impact was outside off
played off the back foot through square leg
moves forward and outside off to drive the ball towards long-on, lots of wrist in that shot
good length around off stump with that round arm action, Akmal stays back, moves a tough across and tucks the ball on the leg side for a single
moves back and towards the leg side to cut the short of a length ball past point for two more
a fuller ball on middle and leg, that dipped on Malik who then pushed it out towards midwicket
excellent line and length again, just outside off, the batsman defends on the front foot
punched from the crease to point
a full ball on the pads, Shahzad's been great with a metronomic length around off stump so far but that was poor with fine leg in the circle, Malik clips it wide of the fielder for a boundary
pitches around off and spins into the right-hander, tucked off the pads to short fine leg
pushed to long on for a single
a full ball on the pads, clipped through square leg for another single
bowled flat and fast on middle stump, turned off the pads behind square leg
played back to the bowler on the front foot
that's a poor ball but Malik fails to put it away, it was full outside leg stump, Malik moved across his crease and glanced it but could not beat short fine leg
short of a length and Akmal slogs behind square though the ball does not bounce much, Naveed runs to his left from long leg and dives to save the boundary
nudged off the pads through square leg
Malik stays back and pushes the ball with a straight bat past the bowler for a single
Akmal jumps out of his crease and lofts a full ball flat over the head of the fielder at mid-off, the ball bounces inches before the boundary, Pakistan have not hit a six yet
Akmal stays back and dabs late - aiming for third man - but the ball seams in from a good length outside off and beats the inside edge
Akmal opens the face and steers the ball behind point, he sets off for the single but Malik sees the fielder get to the ball quickly and dive and so he sends Akmal back
played off the pads from a middle stump line to midwicket
bowled flat and fast on middle stump, Malik can't get under the ball and he hits it firmly to long on
nudged off the pads behind square leg for a single
a full toss on the pads, a quick one, Malik flicks it along the ground to deep midwicket
on the pads again but the batsman only glances the ball to short fine leg, the batsman wants one but gets sent back by the non-striker
backs away outside leg and chips the ball inside out over extra cover
a length ball outside off, Malik drives firmly off the front foot but hits it to the man at short cover

a full ball on middle stump, Malik stands in his crease and drives the ball superbly along the ground towards the wide long-on boundary, the fielder in the deep dives full length to his right but can't save it
jumps back and tucks the ball off the pads behind square for a single
that is the first six of the innings! Akmal puts the short ball away, muscling the pull off the front foot over deep midwicket, they are getting a move on, finally
oh my, that is a wild, wild slog. Akmal tried to heave the ball over the leg side but the line was too wide outside off and the length was good too, he made no contact
beaten again! Akmal tries to run the ball to third man but the bounce is good from a length and the ball zips past the bat
Malik tucks the ball off the back foot towards the empty midwicket region, the bowler chases after the ball himself so the batsmen hesitate for the second. Malik wanted it, Akmal did not

Akmal comes forward and flicks the ball in the air over the infield at midwicket, the fielder runs forward from the deep and gets to the ball on the first bounce and releases it quickly to keep the batsmen to one
defended on the leg side
Malik charges the bowler, gets to the pitch of the ball and lofts it cleanly over long-on, perfect execution from the experienced batsman
played back towards the bowler
goes back and tucks the ball through square leg for a single
a low full toss, Malik moves forward and drives to long-on
a full ball outside off, Akmal stays in his crease and hacks at the ball, dragging it from outside off towards long on with no timing
steps out to a full toss and drives it calmly into the gap on the extra cover boundary, Malik is doing this smoothly now
in the blockhole, dug out on the off side

Malik has top-edged the pull and the fielder running in from deep square leg has dropped it! Usman Mushtaq was the fielder. I think he ran in too quickly and slipped a bit as he got to the ball, it popped out and he could not grab the second chance either. Such a great chance for UAE and they haven't taken it, that might be the game. That short ball rose quickly on Malik
played on the off side
a full toss and Malik puts it away to the deep midwicket boundary, pulled into the gap

brings up his fifty with a six! Malik steps out of his crease and heaves the ball over cow corner, he hit that cleanly and he hasn't hit all of them that well today. Such a valuable innings for Pakistan, who were in real trouble when he came to bat
played through midwicket for a single
played back to the bowler
moves far outside leg side and plays the full and flat ball to the bowler
moves back and turns the ball off his pads through square leg
cannot bowl full tosses on the pads and expect to get away with it, Akmal gets on the front foot and hits across the line, lofting the ball into the stands beyond square leg

short and wide outside off, clearly overcompensated for that previous ball, Akmal waits on the back foot and cuts so hard, with a real flourish, third man is in the circle and that ball raced past him
deep in the stands beyond cow corner, the 100 stand comes up off 87 balls. Akmal heaved a full ball off the front foot with great use of his wrists
flicked along the ground to deep midwicket
a good length ball on middle after ages, Malik defends towards the bowler
a half-volley on middle, angling into the right-hander, Malik gets under it and hoists it far over the wide long-on boundary to take Pakistan within four runs of victory
good length angling into the right-hander, extra bounce too, akmal takes his bottom hand off the bat as he defends on the leg side

Akmal jumps out and towards leg and flashes hard, carving the ball off the outside edge towards third man, falls well short of the fielder. Akmal reaches his fifty too. He's played so sensibly, mostly
dabbed with soft hands behind point, Malik begins to amble the single but gets sent back
that's the game, a great cut shot to finish, the length is not short and the line isn't wide, but Malik moves slightly towards leg on the back foot and uses those supple wrists to execute perfectly
